Generated Narrative: ValueSet observation-vitalsign-measurement

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in http://loinc.org, where the codes are contained in Vital Signs - Body Height
  • Include all codes defined in http://loinc.org, where the codes are contained in Vital Signs - Panel
  • Include all codes defined in http://loinc.org, where the codes are contained in Vital Signs - BP Panel
  • Include all codes defined in http://loinc.org, where the codes are contained in Vital Signs - BMI
  • Include all codes defined in http://loinc.org, where the codes are contained in Vital Signs - Body Temp
  • Include all codes defined in http://loinc.org, where the codes are contained in Vital Signs - Body Weight
  • Include all codes defined in http://loinc.org, where the codes are contained in Vital Signs - Heart Rate
  • Include all codes defined in http://loinc.org, where the codes are contained in Vital Signs - Respiratory Rate
  • Include all codes defined in http://loinc.org, where the codes are contained in Vital Signs - Oxygen Sat
  • Include all codes defined in http://loinc.org, where the codes are contained in Vital Signs - Head Circumference

name: VitalSignsMeasurement
title: Vital Signs Measurement
description: This value set includes the set of expected vital sign measurement codes.
